name: Philadelphia FIGHT - Jonathan Lax Treatment Center
organization: Philadelphia FIGHT - Jonathan Lax Treatment Center
description: Their team offers compassionate, culturally competent, integrated, patient-centered medical care, and social services to people living with HIV. They see patients from all walks of life and their team of dedicated providers works to address the unique needs of each individual. Their goal is to provide comprehensive care to all patients in a “one-stop-shop: setting. Inclusivity and respect for the dignity of their patients is at the center of all that they do here at FIGHT.
